MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY14 postcode area of Cupar. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.50am to carry out repairs to an underground cable fault near to Lindores House and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.26am on Monday 28th December 2020.
